NewsItem.HEADLINE: IoT 2019 Expert Insight 1 (PDF)
NewsItem.SUMMARY: A strategic view of how 5G URLLC IoT is dependent on Edge Computing and Private LTE business models for success.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: This Expert INSIGHT lays out a rationale for how the 5G IoT market will grow, and how the radio latency alone will not be enough to drive significant market growth. Edge Computing will have a bigger impact on latency than the radio layer. And Private LTE/5G investment will be important in opening up large markets.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: 5G URLLC IoT Convergence Private LTE Private 5G Edge Computing MEC Multi-access Edge Computing
